extension.summary: Stream and download videos from the links catalogued on Icefilms.info
extension.description:
Stream and download to your library DVD and HD720p quality videos. Browse and search the library of over 77,000 videos with metadata and posters.
Disclaimer: This addon in no way condones or endorses piracy, it is at the users discretion as to whether content found within this addon complies with their local copyright laws. All content is found on the originating website Icefilms.info. The addon is in no way affiliated with the website. The addon simply scrapes what is available and does not attempt to distinguish between what is copyright material.
